judges: Before Jones, C. J., Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts, Pomeroy, Nix and Manderino, JJ.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
The order of the Commonwealth Court is vacated and the record is remanded for further proceedings and consideration in the light of our decision in Re: Nomination Paper of Thomas E. Welsh for the Sixth (6) Senatorial District.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: Richard J. Harcar, with him Community Legal Services, Inc., for appellant.
La/rrick B. Stapleton, with him Franchot Golub, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Sparks Appeal.
Argued October 3,1974.
Before Jones, C. J., Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts, Pomeroy, Nix and Manderino, JJ.
Richard J. Harcar, with him Community Legal Services, Inc., for appellant.
La/rrick B. Stapleton, with him Franchot Golub, for appellee.
October 10, 1974:
